name: Don't Get Hit (Tyler Green)
description:
This game was made to learn machine learning. Although the game itself doesn't involve it, the video trailer shows how I trained an AI to get really good at this game and get a higher score than me at the game.

You can download the game and try to get an even higher score! It's also available free for iOS: https://apps.apple.com/app/dont-get-hit-avoid-walls/id1542704772
